entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.0°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 20 after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 8:37 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:37 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light before morning. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 34 in the evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 8:37 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
